attributes.action: David Cameron to take part in a televised debate with Nigel Farage.
attributes.background: We would like to see a live televised debate between David Cameron and Nigel Farage on the the subject of EU membership.  The debate should be a simple one to one and take place prior the EU referendum.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
